price: Maze tumuha kororoka (kw’abamukomokaho) binyuze mu ntanga (twashyize) mu cyicaro gitekanye (nyababyeyi),
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ نُطۡفَةٗ فِي قَرَارٖ مَّكِينٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿalnāhu nuṭ'fatan fī qarārin makīnin
